member.name: KERB_S4U_LOGON
member.summary: The KERB_S4U_LOGON structure contains information about a service for user (S4U) logon. This structure is used by the function with the Kerberos package.

member.name: KERB_S4U_LOGON.MessageType
member.summary: A value of the enumeration that identifies the type of logon being requested. This member must be set to KerbS4ULogon.

summary.para: Flags that provide more information about the logon.

listheader.description: Requests the hours that the user has been logged on.

summary.para: A that specifies the user principal name (UPN) of the client. This member cannot be NULL.
The Buffer member of the structure must point to memory that is contiguous to the KERB_S4U_LOGON structure.
A that specifies the realm of the client, if known. If the realm is not known, this member can be NULL.
The Buffer member of the structure must point to memory that is contiguous to the KERB_S4U_LOGON structure.
